title: FIRST ANNIVERSARY AKATA GOAVANA - Sahambavy
content:
The winning strategy for success and innovation

The AKATA GOAVANA team celebrated its first anniversary on September 10, 2021, by organizing a team building event at Lake Sahambavy Hotel. Let's take a look back at this event that marked the team's solidarity.

 

A day focused on sharing and cohesion

The AKATA GOAVANA team created a program filled with unforgettable moments. The morning started with a picturesque bike ride, followed by various recreational activities in the afternoon, from boat rides to photo sessions. Lunch, a moment of conviviality, brought the team together in a relaxed atmosphere.

 

Caring leadership: The key to AKATA GOAVANA's success

Through this initiative, AKATA GOAVANA reaffirms its caring, positive, and unifying leadership, which is the key to lasting motivation and collaboration within the team. This plays a crucial role in the group dynamics that contribute to their success.

 

A united team, prosperous projects

According to the GOAVANA philosophy, a fulfilled and supportive team naturally leads to increased commitment and tangible results, forming the foundation for sustainable performance. This approach is validated by the repeated success of projects that have fully satisfied their clients.

 

Therefore, this activity represents not only a celebration but also embodies an essential strategy for AKATA GOAVANA to maintain and strengthen a high-performing team, prepared to confidently and determinedly face future challenges.

 

Commitment, cohesion, and success are at the core of AKATA GOAVANA's DNA, ready to transform their clients' vision into flawless digital reality. More than just a company, it is a promise of a winning partnership for every project!

title: OFFICE ARRANGEMENT
content:
A new office, a new step towards excellence.

AKATA GOAVANA marks a major milestone with the opening of its offices in early January 2022, symbolizing an important step in our development and our relentless pursuit of operational excellence.

 

An environment suited for technological excellence

This new, functional and suitable location aims to create an environment conducive to collaboration, innovation, and the realization of large-scale technological projects for the entire team.

 

A strategic location for a new era

Beyond a simple relocation, this new establishment reflects AKATA GOAVANA's total commitment to its employees, clients, and partners. A strategic choice affirming our position as a leading technological partner.

 

Ready to welcome challenges

Our team is ready to transform this new space into a place where ideas come to life, where collaboration reaches new heights, and where mutual trust thrives.

 

AKATA GOAVANA remains your trusted partner in driving innovation and collective success. We are ready to embrace the future with boldness and determination!

title: Internal Hackathon ENI - 2022
content:
AKATA GOAVANA x  ENI : Hackathon

On Saturday, March 19, 2022, the CEO of AKATA GOAVANA was invited to participate as a jury member in a hackathon organized by ENI (Ecole Nationale d’Informatique) focused on online registration and control of admission exam results at the ENI.

 

An expert jury to evaluate the achievements

Alongside IT professionals and representatives from the ENI, AKATA GOAVANA actively contributed to the exchanges and evaluations of the prototypes presented by the participating teams. Our participation aimed to provide a fresh perspective on achievements in terms of code quality, usability, and innovation. These are key criteria for the success of large-scale technological projects, which are at the core of AKATA GOAVANA's expertise.

 

Shared expertise, new connections

AKATA GOAVANA seized the opportunity to share its know-how with young talents, contributing to the evaluation of innovative projects presented by the teams. This direct interaction strengthens the company's positioning as a dynamic and committed actor.

 

AKATA GOAVANA, an active and engaged player

Beyond the Hackathon, AKATA GOAVANA's participation highlights its ongoing commitment to innovation and its role as a trusted partner. The company positions itself not only as a key player but also as the ideal choice for those seeking technological excellence.

 

A strategic partner ready to offer innovative solutions and support emerging talents, AKATA GOAVANA remains at the forefront of technological advancements.

 

Participating in such events allows us to foster fruitful collaborations. After all, innovation is also built through exchanges among seasoned professionals!

title: Official presentation of the new MVola API: The MP Chatbot Messenger project has been chosen to share the experience during the implementation of this API.
content:
AKATA GOAVANA at the Forefront of the Presentation of MVola's New API

 

On April 29, 2022, AKATA GOAVANA made its presence known at the official launch event of MVola's brand new API. During this event, our innovative project, MP Chatbot Messenger, was selected to showcase our expertise and experience in implementing this revolutionary API.

 

An enriching experience-sharing

AKATA GOAVANA had the opportunity to actively participate in the conference and engage in fruitful discussions with the entire MVola team. This immersion not only allowed us to present our project but also to learn more about the functionalities of the new API.

 

Expanding technological horizons

During the discussions with MVola's CEO and his team, new perspectives opened up to us: the discovery of another API that will integrate perfectly with our project, paving the way for the next phase of development and innovation.

 

A proactive technological partner

By constantly exploring new opportunities, AKATA GOAVANA establishes itself as a key player in the technological ecosystem. We are not only attentive to the latest advancements but also ready to integrate them into our ongoing projects.

 

In direct contact with the latest market developments, AKATA GOAVANA confirms its position at the forefront of innovation!

title: AKATA GOAVANA - 2YEARS
content:
AKATA GOAVANA : Two years of excellence and innovation

AKATA GOAVANA celebrated its two years of existence on September 10, 2022, at Zomatel Fianarantsoa through an event highlighting its achievements and strategic partnerships.

 

A grand celebration matching GOAVANA's ambitions

This exceptional day was marked by a fashion show, fiery performances by renowned dancers, and concerts by famous artists. A festive atmosphere that reflects the dynamic spirit of AKATA GOAVANA!

 

MP Chatbot Messenger in the spotlight

At the heart of this celebration, the true star shines: MP Chatbot Messenger, a revolutionary chatbot developed by AKATA GOAVANA.

On that day, MP Chatbot was officially unveiled to the public. This versatile tool redefines the experience for businesses and users by offering a wide range of features, including customer support, order management, and payments.

 

Promising partnerships at the forefront

The event also highlighted key partnerships, including eminent companies such as MVola, Futurella Madagascar, and My Passion. These collaborations propel AKATA GOAVANA to new heights, redefining its major role in the technological landscape.

 

After two years of putting its technological expertise at the service of businesses, AKATA GOAVANA reaffirms its mission of continuous innovation!

title: Preparation for the Global Tech Summit GOAVANA IT
content:
AKATA GOAVANA leading the way in a BIG Tech Event.

AKATA GOAVANA is currently preparing a major event that goes beyond the boundaries of the company: the “Global Tech Summit GOAVANA' IT”, co-organized with ENI (Ecole Nationale d’Informatique) and EMIT (Ecole de Management et d’Innovation Technologique), in close collaboration with the President of the University of Fianarantsoa.

 

This event symbolizes a promising and revolutionary alliance, bringing grand prospects for Fianarantsoa and Madagascar.

 

New horizons, new initiatives

Beyond its professional activities, AKATA GOAVANA places its commitment to technology at the core of its identity. It intends to deploy innovative initiatives and contribute significantly to the sector's evolution by organizing this major technological event.

 

A major technological event signed by AKATA GOAVANA

The Global Tech Summit GOAVANA' IT is becoming a must-attend event, gathering the brightest creative minds in the tech world from all corners of Madagascar. Its ultimate ambition is to solidify Fianarantsoa's position as a leading technology city in Madagascar.

 

A showcase for local innovations

The Global Tech Summit GOAVANA' IT aims to achieve ambitious goals:

  • Highlight the innovative products of Malagasy tech startups.
  • Showcase the exceptional expertise of talented roboticists in the country.
  • Bring together national and international experts to foster experience sharing and catalyze collaboration.

 

It is more than just a large-scale event; it is an opportunity to collectively redefine the technological landscape of the country.

 

By setting high standards in innovation, AKATA GOAVANA reinforces its position as a strategic partner shaping the future of the digital world.

title: Global Tech Summit GOAVANA' IT (3rd anniversary AKATA GOAVANA)
content:
Towards a promising tech future!

Reflecting on the major tech event organized by AKATA GOAVANA, which took place at ENI (Ecole Nationale d’Informatique) Fianarantsoa from September 28th to October 1st, 2023.

 

An event celebrating AKATA GOAVANA's three-year anniversary

AKATA GOAVANA celebrated its third anniversary with a technological innovation event, reflecting three years of hard work, challenges, and triumphs that have skyrocketed the company to a future filled with endless possibilities.

 

An inclusive and rewarding program

The event featured tech startup exhibition booths, robotic presentation and demonstration workshops, video conferences with internationally renowned tech experts, student workshops for inspiring exchanges, and competitions including the "Miray Algo Contest" algorithm competition and the "L'Arène des Génies" quiz game, adding a playful touch to the event. The whole experience concluded with a sensational live performance by famous local artists.

 

Successful partnerships and collaborations

Partnerships with key entities such as English Vision, Computer Store, and Futurella Madagascar highlight AKATA GOAVANA's commitment to technological development.

 

A symbol of continuous innovation

This first edition of the Global Tech Summit GOAVANA'IT marks the beginning of a more ambitious vision. AKATA GOAVANA is already planning the second edition, ensuring an even more promising tech future.

title: Thesis presentation of our collaborators
content:
A triumphant evolution at AKATA GOAVANA: the "Success Story" goes on ...

AKATA GOAVANA celebrates another major milestone through the exceptional success of its employees, who have recently graduated with a Professional Master's degree from ENI (Ecole Nationale d’Informatique) Fianarantsoa.

 

An outstanding performance: one of our quality values at AKATA GOAVANA

The thesis presentation was an opportunity for our graduates to demonstrate their level of skill and expertise, which truly impressed the members of the jury. An exceptional performance that highlighted the positive impact of their hard work at AKATA GOAVANA.

 

AI in action

Artificial Intelligence has been at the core of these achievements, bringing an innovative touch to the topics addressed. This successful integration of AI demonstrates AKATA GOAVANA's commitment to adopting cutting-edge technologies, keeping them at the forefront of the IT industry.

 

An exceptional team: the engine of our success

Beyond degrees, our exceptional team is the pillar of our success. Each of our talents brings unique expertise, contributing to shaping a culture of excellence within AKATA GOAVANA.

 

Each individual success of our team strengthens our collective ability to overcome challenges and excel in the ever-evolving digital world.
